name: Overkill Express
description:
At OverKill Express, we are commited to delivering your package in time no matter the circumstances. Even if there is a zombie apocalypse and the world is about to end. Thank you and we hope you are happy with our services.

How To Play:
W - Drive forward
A - Turn left
S - Drive backward
D - Turn right
Left Mouse - Click UI

Objective:
1. Kill zombies
2. Upgrade your car
3. Kill more zombies
4. Repeat
